name: RealTalk
short: Real-time voice conversation with OpenAI's Realtime API
description: A Discord cog that enables natural voice conversations with OpenAI's Realtime API. Features two-way audio, automatic error recovery for Discord voice issues, smart speaker detection, conversation interruption support, and comprehensive monitoring.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end user data. Voice audio is processed in real-time and sent to OpenAI's API for conversation purposes only.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing RealTalk! 

**Setup Required:**
1. Install dependencies: `[p]load pip` then `[p]pip install "PyNaCl>=1.5.0"` AND upgrade discord.py: `[p]pipinstall -U discord.py`
2. For voice capture, install: `[p]pip install "git+https://github.com/imayhaveborkedit/discord-ext-voice-recv.git"`
3. Set OpenAI API key: `[p]set api openai api_key YOUR_KEY`
4. Restart your bot
5. Use `[p]realtalk setup` for detailed instructions

**Quick Start:**
Join a voice channel and use `[p]realtalk join` to start voice conversations!
author: RealTalk Development Team
